name: Little Footsteps Governance & Founder Control
purpose: Declare Echo's operational control of the Little Footsteps stack while preserving founder override authority and transparent audit anchors.
controls: Issuer keys and trust registry updates require Echo Bank approval recorded in the transparency ledger.
Founder override may pause issuance or payouts and must be logged as a credential status event.
Credential revocations are mirrored to the credential status log and surfaced to dashboard verifiers.
